titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that there is a critical need to increase research, awareness, and education about cerebral cavernous malformations.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E897)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
5/13/2008--Introduced.
Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that there is a critical need to increase research, awareness, and education about cerebral cavernous malformations.
